title: Blocks (TEFC)
creator_credit: G.A. Howe and MacMillan Film Productions
brief_description: This film shows how constructive play with blocks of different shapes and sizes can be used to foster the basic perceptive skills and to develop logical thinking, concepts of height, eye-hand co-ordination, symmetry and balance.
description: This film shows how constructive play with blocks of different shapes and sizes can be used to foster the basic perceptive skills and to develop logical thinking, concepts of height, eye-hand co-ordination, symmetry and balance.
